channel.title: Comments on: The Evil Quest NPC

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.content:encoded:
First, he wants you to pick up some animal shit.

Hi I’m Mike Rowe, and digging through poo for beans…it’s a Dirty Job

It’s funny though I was thinking the same thing when he sent me off to burn the village, I was like wow they have a nice religious zealot here. But we did it for sheer reward (ooooh XP gimme gimme), so I guess that makes all of us worse than he ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Ravven
item.dc:creator: Ravven
item.description: Don't forget the quest to kill elephants (okay, so they were elekks, big diff) for ivory. How non-pc is that?
item.content:encoded: Don’t forget the quest to kill elephants (okay, so they were elekks, big diff) for ivory. How non-pc is that?

item.title: By: Bored-at-work » The Furor dance (180degree’s and spinning) … shit happens
item.dc:creator: Bored-at-work » The Furor dance (180degree’s and spinning) … shit happens
item.description: [...] Foton @ Afkgamer sums it up better than I can [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Foton @ Afkgamer sums it up better than I can […]

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: There have been times when I've found myself reading a quest, and I'll look up at my husband and say, "hmm, our characters sure are gullible, aren't they?" as we run off to do the bidding of yet another character who's obviously a bad guy in disguise (thinking of the dragon in human form in Searing Gorge right now).
item.content:encoded: There have been times when I’ve found myself reading a quest, and I’ll look up at my husband and say, “hmm, our characters sure are gullible, aren’t they?” as we run off to do the bidding of yet another character who’s obviously a bad guy in disguise (thinking of the dragon in human form in Searing Gorge right now).

item.title: By: steven
item.dc:creator: steven
item.description: blizzard knows that players will do anything in this game. I bet they laugh their assess when we complete these quests.
item.content:encoded:
blizzard knows that players will do anything in this game.
I bet they laugh their assess when we complete these quests.

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description:
Yeah, the truly depressing thing is that was not the first, or second, time I'd found myself heroically sifting through the droppings of some e-beast.
The Outland Sucks line, referenced above, and also the bog giants in Zang - they didn't spell it out, but that was sure as shit, uh, shit.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, the truly depressing thing is that was not the first, or second, time I’d found myself heroically sifting through the droppings of some e-beast.

The Outland Sucks line, referenced above, and also the bog giants in Zang – they didn’t spell it out, but that was sure as shit, uh, shit.

item.title: By: Empty Donut Box
item.dc:creator: Empty Donut Box
item.content:encoded:
First, he wants you to pick up some animal shit. A LOT of animal shit.

Reminds me of that oh-so-entertaining felhound doggywalk in Hellfire Peninsula. That thing had rancid diarrhea– Kill a boar, it munches it down.. two seconds later a nice, fresh, greenish-brown pile of happiness to dig through. I had to sift through about 15 piles of felhound dung to get that key.

Y’know I felt like an errand boy whilst doing quests before, but now Blizzard is turning me into a gimp.
